scripts.network: hc s clean && pnpm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "pnpm run start:agent"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently -k "pnpm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && pnpm run start -w ui"
scripts.test: pnpm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && pnpm test --filter tests
scripts.start:happ: concurrently "RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s --piped generate workdir/new-app.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a new-app network mdns" "pnpm run playground"
scripts.package: pnpm run build:happ && pnpm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: pnpm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
